headline: Here’s Why The Trade Desk (TTD) Traded Down in Q1
summary: Parnassus Investments, an investment management company, released the “Parnassus Mid Cap Growth Fund” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Russell Midcap Growth Index fell 7.12% in the first quarter, starting with a continuation of the late 2024 rally but later experiencing a sharp decline. The Fund (Investor […]

headline: The Trade Desk, HOY Expand Partnership to Boost Programmatic CTV Advertising in Hong Kong
summary: The Trade Desk Inc. (NASDAQ:TTD) is one of the best NASDAQ growth stocks to buy for the next 3 years. On June 18, The Trade Desk announced an expanded partnership with HOY. The collaboration will enable programmatic trading of HOY’s connected TV/CTV advertising inventory via The Trade Desk’s platform. HOY will adopt advanced identity and […]
